00008 SMPPClient::SMPPClient() {
00009 
00010         MT_LOGINIT(SMPPClient)
00011 
00012         m_pduFactory = new PduFactory();
00013 
00014         inQ = new Queue<Data*> ;
00015         outQ = new Queue<Data*> ;
00016         userQ = new Queue<Data*> ;
00017         m_proc = new ClientProcessor();
00018         m_serviceType = "VMA";
00019         //      m_udhSmsId = 0;
00020         insp = NULL;
00021         m_mysql = NULL;
00022         m_startReqId = 1;
00023         m_stepReqId = 1;

00027 bool SMPPClient::isActive() {
00028         bool ret = false;
00029 
00030         if (insp != NULL) {
00031                 ret = insp->IsActive();
00032         }
00033 
00034         return ret;
00035 }

00037 void SMPPClient::close() {
00038 
00039         Data *data = new Data;
00040         data->msg = new Message();
00041         data->msg->type = UNBIND;
00042         Smpp::Unbind *un = new Smpp::Unbind();
00043         un->sequence_number(m_proc->GetSeqNum());
00044         data->hdr = un;
00045         pthread_mutex_init(&(data->unbindMtx), NULL);
00046         pthread_mutex_lock(&(data->unbindMtx));
00047         outQ->push(data);
00048         pthread_mutex_lock(&(data->unbindMtx));
00049 
00050 }

00052 SMPPClient::~SMPPClient() {
00053         delete inQ;
00054         delete outQ;
00055         delete userQ;
00056         delete m_proc;
00057 }

00059 unsigned int SMPPClient::GetReqId() {
00060 
00061         unsigned int tMsgIdsMaxId = 0;
00062         unsigned int tDeliverSmsCacheMaxId = 0;
00063 
00064         try {
00065 
00066                 DbDataPtr dbData = m_mysql->exec(
00067                                 "SELECT req_id FROM tMsgIds ORDER by req_id DESC LIMIT 1");
00068                 if (!dbData) {
00069                         m_logger->debug("can't get message id from db. db is empty");
00070                 } else {
00071                         if (!dbData->isEmpty()) {
00072                                 tMsgIdsMaxId = dbData->getColumn(0).getUnsignedInt(0);
00073                                 m_logger->info("read max req_id from db tMsgIds %d",
00074                                                 tMsgIdsMaxId);
00075                                 tMsgIdsMaxId++;
00076                         }
00077                 }
00078 
00079                 dbData
00080                                 = m_mysql->exec(
00081                                                 "SELECT req_id FROM tDeliverSmCache ORDER by req_id DESC LIMIT 1");
00082                 if (!dbData) {
00083                         m_logger->debug("can't get message id from db. db is empty");
00084                 } else {
00085                         if (!dbData->isEmpty()) {
00086                                 tDeliverSmsCacheMaxId = dbData->getColumn(0).getUnsignedInt(0);
00087                                 m_logger->info("read max req_id from db tDeliverSmCache %d",
00088                                                 tDeliverSmsCacheMaxId);
00089                                 tDeliverSmsCacheMaxId++;
00090                         }
00091                 }
00092         } catch (const mt::Exception &e) {
00093                 MT_LOGWARNING("data exception. " << e.displayText())
00094         }
00095 
00096         m_logger->info("Preseted req_id is %u", m_startReqId);
00097 
00098         if (tMsgIdsMaxId < tDeliverSmsCacheMaxId)
00099                 tMsgIdsMaxId = tDeliverSmsCacheMaxId;
00100 
00101         if (tMsgIdsMaxId < m_startReqId)
00102                 tMsgIdsMaxId = m_startReqId;
00103 
00104         if (m_startReqId % 2) { //odd
00105                 if (!(tMsgIdsMaxId % 2)) {
00106                         tMsgIdsMaxId++;
00107                 }
00108         } else { //even
00109                 if ((tMsgIdsMaxId % 2)) {
00110                         tMsgIdsMaxId++;
00111                 }
00112         }
00113         return tMsgIdsMaxId;
00114 
00115 }

00117 int SMPPClient::init(XmlConfigPtr cfg) {
00118 
00119         if (cfg) {
00120                 m_serviceType = cfg->get("system_type");
00121                 m_logger->debug("system type = %s", m_serviceType.c_str());
00122 
00123                 m_systemId = cfg->get("system_id");
00124                 m_connectionType = cfg->get("connection_type");
00125                 MT_LOG_SETPREFIX(m_systemId + ":" + m_connectionType)
00126         } else {
00127                 MT_LOGERROR("cfg is NULL");
00128                 return -1;
00129         }
00130 
00131         m_codecToUcs2 = CodecFactory::getCodec("UTF-8", "UCS-2BE");
00132         m_codecTo8bit = CodecFactory::getCodec("UTF-8", "ASCII");
00133         m_codecTo7bit = CodecFactory::getCodec("UTF-8", "ASCII");
00134 
00135         if (!m_codecToUcs2 || !m_codecTo8bit || !m_codecTo7bit) {
00136                 MT_LOGERROR("can't init codecs");
00137                 return -1;
00138         }
00139 
00140         try {
00141                 m_proc->setInQ(inQ);
00142                 m_proc->setOutQ(outQ);
00143                 m_proc->setUserQ(userQ);
00144                 m_proc->setSystemId(m_systemId);
00145                 m_proc->setConnectionType(m_connectionType);
00146 
00147                 insp = new ClientInspector(cfg, m_proc);
00148                 try {
00149                         XmlConfigPtr dbCfg = cfg->getConfig(std::string("database"));
00150                         if (dbCfg) {
00151 
00152                                 bool createDb = false;
00153                                 std::string host = dbCfg->get("host");
00154                                 std::string user = dbCfg->get("user");
00155                                 std::string pass = dbCfg->get("password");
00156                                 std::string db = dbCfg->get("database");
00157                                 if (db.length() == 0) {
00158                                         createDb = true;
00159                                         db = "msmpp_" + m_systemId;
00160                                 }
00161 
00162                                 m_mysql = new MysqlConnector(host, user, pass, db);
00163 
00164                                 if ((m_mysql->init(!createDb) < 0)) {
00165                                         m_logger->error("can't init database");
00166                                         return -1;
00167                                 }
00168 
00169                                 if (createDb) {
00170                                         try {
00171 
00172                                                 try {
00173                                                         m_mysql->execCmd("create database " + db);
00174                                                         m_mysql->execCmd(
00175                                                                         "CREATE TABLE `tDeliverSmCache` (`req_id` int(11) NOT NULL default '0',"
00176                                                                                 "`context` char(255) default NULL,"
00177                                                                                 "`part_num` int(11) default NULL,"
00178                                                                                 "PRIMARY KEY  (`req_id`)"
00179                                                                                 ") ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1");
00180 
00181                                                         m_mysql->execCmd(
00182                                                                         "CREATE TABLE `tMsgIds` (`msg_id` char(65) NOT NULL default '',`req_id` int(11) default NULL,PRIMARY KEY  (`msg_id`)) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1");
00183                                                 } catch (const mt::DbExistDbException &e) {
00184                                                         MT_LOGDEBUG("already have db");
00185                                                 }
00186 
00187                                         } catch (...) {
00188                                                 MT_LOGERROR("can't create database '" << db <<"'for smpp client")
00189                                                 return -1;
00190                                         }
00191                                         m_mysql->execCmd("use " + db);
00192 
00193                                 }
00194 
00195                                 if (m_proc->InitDb(host, user, pass, db) < 0) {
00196                                         m_logger->error("can't init database");
00197                                         return -1;
00198                                 }
00199 
00200                         } else {
00201                                 m_logger->error("can't find database config");
00202                                 return -1;
00203                         }
00204 
00205                 } catch (const mt::DbException& e) {
00206                         MT_LOGERROR("can't init data base. " << e.displayText())
00207 
00208                 }
00209                 unsigned char ton = 0;
00210                 unsigned char npi = 0;
00211 
00212                 XmlConfigPtr bindCfg = cfg->getConfig(std::string("bind_params"));
00213                 if (bindCfg) {
00214                         std::string sTon = bindCfg->get("ton");
00215                         std::string sNpi = bindCfg->get("npi");
00216                         const char* str = sTon.c_str();
00217                         ton = str[0] - 0x30;
00218                         if (ton > 7) {
00219                                 m_logger->warn(
00220                                                 "unknown value for bind_params ton %s. use default 0",
00221                                                 sTon.c_str());
00222                                 ton = 0;
00223                         }
00224 
00225                         str = sNpi.c_str();
00226                         npi = str[0] - 0x30;
00227                         if (npi > 34) {
00228                                 m_logger->warn(
00229                                                 "unknown value for bind_params npi %s. use default 0",
00230                                                 sNpi.c_str());
00231                                 npi = 0;
00232                         }
00233                 }
00234 
00235                 insp->SetTon(ton);
00236                 insp->SetNpi(npi);
00237 
00238                 unsigned int reqId = GetReqId();
00239                 m_logger->info("statrt request id value is %u step for reqId is %u",
00240                                 reqId, m_stepReqId);
00241                 m_proc->SetRequestId(reqId);
00242                 m_proc->SetStepReqId(m_stepReqId);
00243 
00244                 m_proc->start();
00245                 insp->start();
00246 
00247         } catch (...) {
00248                 m_logger->error("can't init SMPP Client. exception");
00249                 return -1;
00250         }
00251         return 0;
00252 }

00254 //return pointer to msg or NULL if error occured; blocking function
00255 Message* SMPPClient::recv() {
00256         Message* msg;
00257         Data* data = userQ->pop();
00258         if (data == NULL) {
00259                 return NULL;
00260         }
00261 
00262         switch (data->hdr->command_id()) {
00263 
00264         case Smpp::CommandId::SubmitSmResp:
00265 
00266                 msg = new Message();
00267                 msg->id = data->id;
00268                 msg->status = data->status;
00269                 msg->type = SUBMIT_RESP;
00270                 break;
00271 
00272         case Smpp::CommandId::DeliverSm:
00273                 msg = data->msg;
00274                 data->msg = NULL;
00275                 msg->id = data->id;
00276                 msg->status = 0;
00277                 msg->type = DELIVERY_REPORT;
00278                 m_logger->debug("send deliver sm to user. context is %s, id is %u",
00279                                 msg->context.c_str(), msg->id);
00280 
00281                 break;
00282 
00283         case Smpp::CommandId::SubmitSm:
00284                 msg = data->msg;
00285                 data->msg = NULL;
00286                 msg->id = data->id;
00287 
00288                 break;
00289 
00290         default:
00291                 msg = NULL;
00292                 break;
00293 
00294         }
00295 
00296         delete data;
00297 
00298         m_logger->debug(
00299                         "return msg: (%s), to (%s), from (%s) deliver(%.2x), context (%s), id %u",
00300                         msg->body.c_str(), msg->to.c_str(), msg->from.c_str(),
00301                         (uint8_t) msg->registeredDelivery, msg->context.c_str(),
00302                         (uint32_t) msg->id);
00303 
00304         return msg;
00305 
00306 }
00307 
00308 int SMPPClient::send(Message* msg) {
00309         int reqId = -1;
00310         uint8_t esmClass = 0x00;
00311 
00312         Request* req = NULL;
00313         Data* data = NULL;
00314         CodecPtr codec;
00315 
00316         switch (msg->codingScheme) {
00317         case ASCII:
00318                 codec = m_codecTo7bit;
00319                 break;
00320         case UCS2:
00321                 codec = m_codecToUcs2;
00322                 break;
00323         default:
00324                 m_logger->warn("coding data scheme not setted");
00325                 return -1;
00326         }
00327 
00328         std::string msgBody;
00329         int len = codec->Encode(msg->body, msgBody);
00330         if (len < 0) {
00331                 m_logger->warn("data encoding error");
00332                 return -1;
00333         }
00334 
00335         try {
00336                 reqId = m_proc->GetRequestId();
00337                 req = new Request(reqId);
00338                 if (msg->registeredDelivery) {
00339                         req->setDeliverResp(true);
00340                 }
00341 
00342                 std::vector<MessagePart>* vect = Utils::segmentateSmsBody(
00343                                 (const uint8_t*) msgBody.data(), msgBody.length());
00344 
00345                 if (vect == NULL) {
00346                         delete req;
00347                         return -1;
00348                 }
00349 
00350                 req->SetTotalParts(vect->size());
00351 
00352                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < vect->size(); i++) {
00353 
00354                         MessagePart part = (*vect)[i];
00355                         data = new Data;
00356                         if (req->GetTotalParts() > 1) {
00357                                 data->udhMsgId = part.first[3];
00358                                 data->udhTotal = part.first[4];
00359                                 data->udhPartNum = part.first[5];
00360                                 esmClass = 0x40;
00361                         }
00362 
00363                         data->req = req;
00364                         data->id = reqId;
00365                         data->hdr = (Smpp::Header*) m_pduFactory->createSubmitSm(msg->to,
00366                                         msg->from, part, msg->codingScheme,
00367                                         (uint8_t) msg->registeredDelivery, esmClass);
00368                         delete part.first;
00369 
00370                         if (data->hdr != NULL) {
00371                                 MT_LOGDEBUG("send to processor SubmitSm from("<<msg->from<<"), to("<< msg->to<<")");
00372                                 MT_LOGTRACE("queue address: " << inQ <<", size: "<< inQ->size())
00373                                 inQ->push(data);
00374                         } else {
00375                                 delete req;
00376                                 delete data;
00377                                 return -1;
00378                         }
00379                 }
00380 
00381                 delete vect;
00382 
00383                 if (req->needDeliverResp()) {
00384                         char sql_buf[2048];
00385                         snprintf(sql_buf, 2048,
00386                                         "insert into tDeliverSmCache values( %u, '%s', %u)",
00387                                         req->id, msg->context.c_str(), req->GetTotalParts());
00388                         std::string sqlQuery = sql_buf;
00389                         m_mysql->execCmd(sqlQuery);
00390                 }
00391 
00392         } catch (const std::exception &e) {
00393                 m_logger->error("can't send msg to %s, body %s (%s)", msg->to.c_str(),
00394                                 msg->body.c_str(), e.what());
00395                 return -1;
00396         };
00397         return reqId;
00398 
00399 }
